titles.save-and-ask-to-reload-the-current-page-: Save and ask to reload the current page on next site visit
titles.will-remember-the-room-prompting-you-the: Will remember the room, prompting you the next time you visit if you wish to load this director's room again
titles.toggle-between-the-director-control-room: Toggle between the director control-room view and a scene preview-mode.
titles.hold-ctrl-or-cmd-and-click-to-spotlight-: Hold CTRL (or CMD) and click to spotlight this video
titles.obs-remote-controller-start-stop-and-cha: OBS Remote Controller; start/stop and change scenes.
titles.right-click-this-video-for-additional-op: Right-click this video for additional options
titles.play-a-sound-out-of-the-selected-audio-p: Play a sound out of the selected audio playback device
titles.enable-the-chrome-experimental-features-: Enable the Chrome experimental features flag to use: chrome://flags/#enable-experimental-web-platform-features
titles.adjust-the-amount-of-effect-applied: Adjust the amount of effect applied
titles.remember-and-reuse-the-provided-stream-i: Remember and reuse the provided stream ID on each visit
titles.consider-using-chrome-instead-of-safari: Consider using Chrome instead of Safari
titles.please-update-your-version-of-ios-for-be: Please update your version of iOS for best performance
titles.the-guest-will-be-able-to-select-digital: The guest will be able to select digital video effects to apply.
titles.a-link-for-the-host-speaker-to-chat-with: A link for the host speaker to chat with the guest; 2-way interview chat.
titles.open-a-youtube-video-demoing-the-basics-: Open a YouTube video demoing the basics of VDO.Ninja
titles.for-a-list-of-common-or-known-issues-cli: For a list of common or known issues, click here
titles.click-to-link-out-to-the-vdo-ninja-help-: Click to link out to the VDO.Ninja help guide for common OBS Studio problems
titles.info-on-the-native-app-versions-of-vdo-n: Info on the native app versions of VDO.Ninja
titles.open-a-page-with-recent-vdo-ninja-develo: Open a page with recent VDO.Ninja development and feature updates
titles.show-a-custom-welcome-message-to-the-joi: Show a custom welcome message to the joining guest of this invite link
titles.this-mode-encodes-the-video-and-audio-in: This mode encodes the video and audio into chunks, which are shared with multiple viewers. Limited browser support. Can potentially reduce CPU and improve video quality, but will rely on a buffer.
titles.allow-the-guest-to-select-an-avatar-imag: Allow the guest to select an avatar image for when they hide their camera
titles.use-meshcast-servers-to-restream-video-d: Use Meshcast servers to restream video data from this guest to its viewers, reducing the CPU and upload load in some cases. Will increase latency a bit.
titles.show-an-ovelaid-grid-on-the-guest-s-prev: Show an ovelaid grid on the guest's preview video to help with self-centering of the guest.
titles.make-the-invite-url-encoded-so-parameter: Make the invite URL encoded, so parameters are harder to tinker with by guests. This also debrands the interface and gives it a new domain name.
titles.disable-fit-to-window-optmized-video-sca: Disable fit-to-window optmized video scaling for added sharpness; increases CPU / Network load though.
titles.remotely-change-the-volume-of-this-guest: Remotely change the volume of this guest; updates on release. Dbl-click to reset.
titles.toggle-between-the-message-appearing-as-: Toggle between the message appearing as a large overlay and as normal chat
titles.solo-this-video-everywhere-hold-ctrl-cmd: Solo this video everywhere. (Hold CTRL/CMD to just make video larger)
titles.set-a-countdown-timer-that-this-guest-se: Set a countdown timer that this guest sees. CTRL (cmd) + click to pause.
titles.mirror-the-video-of-this-guest-globally: Mirror the video of this guest globally
titles.face-detection-api-not-detected-you-may-: Face Detection API not detected; you may be able to enable it here: chrome://flags/#enable-experimental-web-platform-features
titles.the-solo-view-link-of-the-director-s-vid: The solo view link of the Director's video.
titles.choose-a-hotkey-for-hold-to-talk-if-usin: Choose a hotkey for Hold-to-Talk. If using Electron Capture, elevate privilleges to have it become global
titles.audio-only-sources-can-be-stylized-in-di: Audio-only sources can be stylized in different ways
titles.clear-site-s-local-storage-and-settings: Clear site's local storage and settings
titles.using-this-may-cause-audio-issues-on-som: Using this may cause audio-issues on some systems
titles.increase-this-at-your-peril-changes-the-: Increase this at your peril. Changes the total inbound video bitrate per guest; mobile devices excluded.
titles.sets-your-max-total-allowed-upload-bandw: Sets YOUR max total allowed upload bandwidth; across all connections
titles.only-the-director-s-video-will-be-visibl: Only the director's video will be visible to guests and within group scenes. (Hold CTRL/CMD to just make video larger)
titles.set-a-count-up-timer-that-this-guest-see: Set a count-up timer that this guest sees. CTRL (cmd) + click to pause.
titles.which-audio-bitrate-target-would-you-pre: Which audio bitrate target would you prefer?
titles.constant-audio-bitrate-or-variable-audio: Constant audio bitrate or variable audio bitrate
titles.remove-background-noise-but-may-limit-au: Remove background noise, but may limit audio quality
titles.let-the-browser-control-the-mic-s-gain-a: Let the browser control the mic's gain automatically
titles.stereo-audio-or-mono-must-have-denoise-o: Stereo audio or mono; must have denoise off for this to work.
titles.which-video-bitrate-target-would-you-pre: Which video bitrate target would you prefer?
titles.which-video-codec-would-you-prefer-to-be: Which video codec would you prefer to be used if available?
titles.select-a-location-that-is-closest-to-bot: Select a location that is closest to both you and your audience.
titles.this-is-the-preview-of-the-director-s-au: This is the preview of the Director's audio and video output.
titles.video-packet-loss-indicator-of-video-pre: Video packet loss indicator of video preview; green is good, red is bad. Flame implies CPU is overloaded. May not reflect the packet loss seen by scenes or other guests.
titles.hold-ctrl-or-cmd-while-clicking-the-vide: Hold CTRL or CMD (‚åò) while clicking the video to open detailed stats
titles.this-will-refresh-the-current-device: This will refresh the current device
titles.takes-the-guest-out-of-queue-mode-they-w: Takes the guest out of queue mode; they will then join as a normal guest.
titles.this-will-reduce-the-gain-80-when-there-: This will reduce the gain ~80% when there is no one talking loudly
titles.hold-ctrl-or-cmd-to-lock-width-and-heigh: Hold CTRL (or cmd) to lock width and height together when changing them
titles.use-this-link-as-a-browser-source-to-cap: Use this link as a Browser Source to capture the video or audio
titles.only-the-director-s-video-will-be-visibl: Only the director's video will be visible to guests and within group scenes
titles.for-more-known-issues-click-here: For more known issues, click here
titles.link-out-to-the-vdo-ninja-help-guide-for: link out to the vdo.ninja help guide for OBS Studio
titles.will-slowly-pan-tilt-and-zoom-in-on-the-: Will slowly pan, tilt, and zoom in on the first face detected
titles.this-will-reconnect-the-guest-s-active-v: This will reconnect the guest's active video source.

miscellaneous.token-room-is-claimed:
The room is claimed by someone else.

Join as a guest or co-director instead.
miscellaneous.volume-control: Volume control for local playback only
miscellaneous.you-have-been-activated: The director has allowed you to see others in the room now
miscellaneous.camera-tip-camlink: Tip: A Cam Link may glitch green/purple if accessed elsewhere while already in use.
miscellaneous.samsung-a-series: Samsung A-series phones may have issues with Chrome; if so, try Firefox Mobile instead or switch video codecs.
miscellaneous.screen-permissions-denied:
Permission to capture denied. Ensure your browser has screen record system permissions

1.On your Mac, choose Apple menu  > System Preferences, click Security & Privacy , then click Privacy.
2.Select Screen Recording.
3.Select the checkbox next to your browser to allow it to record your screen.
miscellaneous.change-audio-output-device:
Audio could not be captured. Please make sure you have an audio output device available.

Some gaming headsets (ie: Corsair) may need to be set to 2-channel output to work, as surround sound drivers may cause problems.
miscellaneous.prompt-access-request: is trying to view your stream. Allow them?
miscellaneous.confirm-reload-user: Are you sure you wish to reload this user's browser?
miscellaneous.webrtc-is-blocked:
‚ö† This browser has either blocked WebRTC or does not support it.

This site will not work without it.

Disable any browser extensions or privacy settings that may be blocking WebRTC, or try a different browser.
miscellaneous.not-clean-session:
Video effects or canvas rendering failed.

Check to ensure any remotely hosted images are cross-origin allowed.
miscellaneous.ios-no-screen-share: Sorry, but your iOS browser does not support screen-sharing. Please see this guide for an alternative method to do so.
miscellaneous.android-no-screen-share: Sorry, your mobile browser does not support screen-sharing. The Android native app does offer basic support for it though.
miscellaneous.no-screen-share-supported:
Sorry, your browser does not support screen-sharing.

Please use the desktop versions of Firefox or Chrome instead.
miscellaneous.speech-not-suppoted: ‚ö† Speech Recognition is not supported by this browser
miscellaneous.blue-yeti-tip: Tip: Blue Yeti microphones may experience issues being overly loud. Please see here for a solution or disable auto-gain in VDO.Ninja.
miscellaneous.site-not-responsive:
Notice: The system cannot be accessed or is currently slow to respond.

If a routing issue, try adding &proxy to the URL; you can also try https://proxy.vdo.ninja or a VPN if the service is blocked in your country. If the main service is down, a backup version is also available here: https://backup.vdo.ninja Contact steve@seguin.email for added help. This service requires the use of Websockets over port 443.
miscellaneous.no-audio-source-detected:
No Audio Source was detected.

If you were wanting to capture an Application's Audio, please see:
https://docs.vdo.ninja/help/guides-and-how-tos#audio for some guides.
miscellaneous.viewer-count: Total outbound p2p connections of this remote stream
miscellaneous.enter-url-for-widget: Enter a URL for a page to embed as a sidebar
miscellaneous.vision-disabled: The Director has disabled your vision temporarily
miscellaneous.invalid-remote-code:
Invalid remote control code.

Use the field below to try again with a different passcode.
miscellaneous.invalid-remote-code-obs:
Invalid remote control code.

The remote OBS system needs a matching passcode set using &remote.

See the documentation for help..
miscellaneous.request-rejected-obs:
The request was rejected.

The remote OBS system needs a matching passcode set using &remote.

See the documentation for help.
miscellaneous.remote-token-rejected: The remote request failed; the &remote token did not match or the remote user does not allow remote control.
miscellaneous.remote-peer-connected:
Remote peer connected to video stream.

Connection to handshake server being killed on request. This increases security, but the peer will not be able to reconnect automatically on connection failure.

Press OK to start the stream!
miscellaneous.director-denied: The main director denied you as a co-director
miscellaneous.only-main-director: Only the main director can transfer this guest
miscellaneous.request-failed: The request failed; you can't apply this action
miscellaneous.tokens-did-not-match: The remote request failed; the remote token did not match or the remote user does not allow remote control.
miscellaneous.token-not-director: The request failed; the remote user did not recognize you as the director
miscellaneous.approved-as-director: The director approved you as a co-director
miscellaneous.you-are-a-codirector: You are a co-director of this room; you have partial director control assigned to you.
miscellaneous.this-is-you:
This is you, a co-director.
You are also a performer.
miscellaneous.preview-meshcast-disabled: You can't adjust the preview bitrate for Meshcast-based streams
miscellaneous.you-not-yet-activated: Please wait until the director brings you into the room
miscellaneous.sample-rate-too-high: Your audio playback device has its sample rate set very high. If having audio issues, try using 48-kHz instead.
miscellaneous.no-network-details:
Network connection lost. ü§∑‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è‚ùåüì∂

Have you lost your Internet connection?
miscellaneous.enter-password-if-desired: Enter a password if provided, otherwise just click Cancel
